name: ngast
description: Parsing tools for Angular. The project is an abstraction over the Angular compiler which provides friendly interface.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js -i dist/index.js > dist/injection.bundle.js && cp package.json dist && ts-node -P tsconfig-ts-node.json tools/cleanup.ts && cp README.md dist

author: Minko Gechev <mgechev@gmail.com>
